00021 #ifndef EXCEPTION_H_
00022 #define EXCEPTION_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 
00026 #include <exception>
00027 #include "Primitives.h"
00028 #include "CurrentFunction.h"
00029 
00030 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00031 
00075 class Exception : public std::exception {
00076 public:
00090     Exception(const char * r = "", const char * f = "unknown",
00091             const unsigned int l = 0)
00092     throw () : _reason(r), _file(f), _line(l), tracemsg(0) {
00093     }
00094 
00099     virtual ~Exception() throw () {
00100         TraceMessage * current = tracemsg;
00101         while(current != null) {
00102             TraceMessage * tmp = current;
00103             current = tmp->next;
00104             delete tmp;
00105         }
00106     }
00107 
00113     const char* what() const throw () {
00114         return _reason;
00115     }
00116 
00124     virtual const char* name() const throw() {
00125         return "Exception";
00126     }
00127 
00136     void addTraceMessage(const char * message) const throw() {
00137         if(tracemsg == null) {
00138             tracemsg = new TraceMessage{message,null};
00139         } else {
00140             TraceMessage * current = tracemsg;
00141             while(current->next != null) {
00142                 current = current->next;
00143             }
00144             current->next = new TraceMessage{message,null};
00145         }
00146     }
00147 
00148     mutable struct TraceMessage {
00149         mutable const char * message;
00150         mutable TraceMessage * next;
00151     } * tracemsg;
00152 protected:
00153     const char * _reason;
00154 public:
00155 #ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00156     const char * _file;
00157     const unsigned int _line;
00158 #endif
00159 };
00160 
00161 #define S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(Class) \
00162 class Class : public ::Sylph::Exception { \
00163 public: \
00164     Class(const char * r = "", const char * f = "unknown", \
00165             const unsigned int l = 0) \
00166     throw () : ::Sylph::Exception(r,f,l) { \
00167     } \
00168     virtual const char* name() const throw() {\
00169         return #Class ; \
00170     }\
00171 }
00172 
00173 #define S_CREATE_EXCEPTION2(Class,Base) \
00174 class Class : public Base { \
00175 public: \
00176     Class(const char * r = "", const char * f = "unknown", \
00177             const unsigned int l = 0) \
00178     throw () : Base(r,f,l) { \
00179     } \
00180     virtual const char* name() const throw() {\
00181         return #Class ; \
00182     }\
00183 }
00184 
00190 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(ArrayException);

00196 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(FileException);
00202 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(IOException);
00207 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(IllegalArgumentException);
00212 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(IllegalStateException);
00218 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(NullPointerException);
00223 S_CREATE_EXCEPTION(SerializationException);

00228 #ifdef SYLPH_DEBUG
00229 #define sthrow(__x, __r) throw __x(__r, __FILE__, __LINE__)
00230 #else
00231 #define sthrow(__x, __r) throw __x(__r)
00232 #endif
00233 
00234 #define strace \
00235 catch(::Sylph::Exception& ex) { \
00236     ex.addTraceMessage(S_CURRENT_FUNCTION); \
00237     throw; \
00238 } do{} while(0)
00239 #ifdef SYLPH_DEBUG
00240 #define straced strace
00241 #else
00242 #define straced do{} while(0)
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 #define if_nullptr(__x) if(SYLPH_UNLIKELY(__x == 0))
00246 #define check_nullptr(__x) if_nullptr(__x) sthrow (NullPointerException, "Dereferenced a null pointer")
00247 #endif  /* EXCEPTION_H_ */
